program.name: libIDL
program.install:
gmake install
case "${SB_SYSTYPE}" in *-aix*) LD_RT="-Wl,-blibpath:" ;; *-osf*|*-irix6*|*-linux*) LD_RT="-Wl,-rpath," ;; *-hpux*) LD_RT="-Wl,+s,+b," ;; *-solaris2*) LD_RT="-R" ;; esac
sed 's!-L\(\${exec_prefix}/lib\)!-L\1 '"${LD_RT}"'\1!' \ ${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/bin/libIDL-config > /tmp/$$ cp /tmp/$$ ${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/bin/libIDL-config rm -f /tmp/$$

Build SysV-style shared libraries on AIX
